timeslot-note: Your appointment is to start fermentation in store, about 15 minutes. We'll contact you when it's time to come back and bottle.
form-note: A confirmation email will be sent to the address provided above.
confirm-text: Thank you! We've received your reservation and will be in touch to confirm. You'll visit us twice: once at your appointment to start fermentation, and again when we let you know it's ready to bottle and take home.
